Tourmad: Tourmad – This website was developed to promote domestic tourism in Uzbekistan and integrates several services such as hotel booking, restaurant services, guide services, driver services for road trips, and many more. In addition, users can explore destinations, check service costs, and make reservations in advance.
Prorun: Prorun.uz – This website hosts regular running competitions. By registering, users can participate in any or all of the events. Why was this site built? Since international participants join these competitions, a new web application was developed to make the registration process easier for everyone.
